name: @olane/o-protocol-specification
description: oLane Protocol specification and protocol schema
author: oLane Inc. (https://olane.com)

scripts.check: npm run check:schema && npm run check:docs
scripts.check:schema: npm run check:schema:ts && npm run check:schema:json
scripts.check:schema:json: for f in schema/*/schema.ts; do typescript-json-schema --defaultNumberType integer --required --skipLibCheck "$f" "*" | cat | cmp "${f%ts}json" - || exit 1; done
scripts.check:docs: npm run check:docs:format && npm run check:docs:links
scripts.generate:json: for f in schema/*/schema.ts; do typescript-json-schema --defaultNumberType integer --required --skipLibCheck "$f" "*" -o "${f%ts}json"; done
